definition: foreign (non-Chinese)/barbarian/classifier for occurrences (of an event, action or speech utterance)/classifier for iterations: times, -fold (as in twofold etc)/classifier for situations: kind, sort
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: It was in the early spring, when the crocus and the snowdrop were in full bloom.
sentences.chinese: 这正是初春的时候，番红花和雪形花正在盛开。

sentences.english: They were crocuses, scattered whimsically throughout the front lawn.
sentences.chinese: 是番红花，在屋前草坪上星罗棋布到处都是。

sentences.english: We want to buy Oil, Tomato Khup , Saffron, Sugar, Alcohol, Pistachio, Fish Ton Saffrons.
sentences.chinese: 我们要采购涂油水，蕃茄，番红花，糖，酒精。

sentences.english: The dwarf iris reticulata blooms with the crocuses.
sentences.chinese: 矮小的网脉鸢尾与番红花一起开花。

sentences.english: The dwarf iris reticulata blooms withthecrocuses.
sentences.chinese: 矮小的网脉鸢尾与番红花一起开花。

sentences.english: The crocus is a herald of spring.
sentences.chinese: 番红花是春天来临的前兆。

sentences.english: The pink crocus bloomed for only a day.
sentences.chinese: 这株粉色番红花只开了一天。

sentences.english: And there, bravely waving in the wind, was one pink crocus .
sentences.chinese: 就在那里，一株勇敢的粉红色的番红花在风中摇曳。

sentences.english: Daffodils and crocuses bloom in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 水仙花和番红花在春天开放。

sentences.english: The dwarf iris reticulata blooms with the crocuses.
sentences.chinese: 网状矮鸢尾与番红花一同开花。

definition: nutmeg (Myristica fragrans Houtt)/mace/Myristicaceae (family of plants producing aromatic or hallucinogenic oils)
